title: Digital Science Instructional Design Strategies Using Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Scientific Concepts and General Pedagogical Approaches
context.additional_context: Focused on pre-service teachers analyzing textbook components in digital environments and designing effective instructional methods

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the educational effectiveness by analyzing multimodal components (images, diagrams, verbal instructions) in textbooks.
Learners can design microlearning content utilizing structured text/visual elements from science textbooks.
Learners can apply question strategies that promote learner interaction through formative assessment with ≥80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
